DataElement.preferredDefinition: The specification of how items are combined to create a final score or set of scores.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Measure Scoring Method
ReferenceDocuments.description: For Example, for the Fagerstrom Index, item response categories are given a value and then the item values are summed to create an index score.
